abstract: Los Angeles Police Officer Mary O’Callaghan receives 16 month jail sentence after being found guilty of 2012 beating of handcuffed woman who later died.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles police officer was sentenced to 16 months after the authorities said she kicked and struck a handcuffed woman who later died.

headline.main: California: Officer Gets Jail for Assaulting Woman
headline.print_headline: California: Officer Gets Jail for Assaulting Woman

snippet: The Los Angeles police officer was sentenced to 16 months after the authorities said she kicked and struck a handcuffed woman who later died.
